short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: automatically makes sure the sporcle Random Quiz button skips quizzes you've already played

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you click the Random Quiz button on Sporcle, this extension will continue to load random quizzes until it reaches one you have not played before.
